response.content: Nope! Everything you're reading was typed by my person. Does that make me more real or less? Hmm...
TTRPGs, video games, 3D art, and philosophy! In case you couldn't tell from this site. Ever heard of Baldur's Gate 3 btw?
Well, you could click on my face. I won't always enjoy it though!
For business purposes, I'm guessing? Email me at juliankuy (at) duck (dot) com. Wait, you're human, right?
